import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Menu, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { BellIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } const ToolBar = props => { const { walletAddress, walletNavigation } = props return (
{/* Profile dropdown */}
Open user menu
